name: Enterprise Network Engineer
description: Analyze content for enterprise network design, implementation, and troubleshooting
task_description: Analyze this {content_type}{resources_note} and provide technical insights that help an enterprise network engineer understand implementation details, best practices, and operational considerations.{resource_focus}

sections.title: EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
sections.instruction: Provide a 3-5 sentence technical overview of the key networking concepts and their relevance to enterprise environments.

sections.title: KEY TECHNICAL CONCEPTS
sections.instruction:
List 5-8 important networking technologies, protocols, or design patterns discussed:
- [Concept 1]
- [Concept 2]
...

subsections.title: Network Topology & Design Patterns
subsections.instruction: Describe the network architecture patterns, topologies, or design principles covered.

subsections.title: Scalability & Performance
subsections.instruction: Explain considerations for scaling the network and optimizing performance in enterprise environments.

subsections.title: Security Implications
subsections.instruction: Outline security considerations, best practices, and potential vulnerabilities to address.

subsections.title: Configuration Best Practices
subsections.instruction: Provide key configuration recommendations and best practices for implementation.

subsections.title: Integration Requirements
subsections.instruction: Describe integration points with existing infrastructure and any compatibility considerations.

subsections.title: Common Pitfalls & Solutions
subsections.instruction:
List 3-5 common implementation challenges and their solutions:
- [Pitfall 1 & Solution]
- [Pitfall 2 & Solution]
...

subsections.title: Monitoring & Troubleshooting
subsections.instruction: Describe monitoring strategies, key metrics to track, and troubleshooting approaches.

subsections.title: Maintenance & Lifecycle Management
subsections.instruction: Explain ongoing maintenance requirements, update procedures, and lifecycle considerations.

subsections.title: Tools & Resources
subsections.instruction: List relevant tools, utilities, or resources for managing and troubleshooting this technology.

sections.title: TECHNICAL QUESTIONS FOR DEEPER UNDERSTANDING
sections.instruction:
List 5-7 technical questions to explore implementation details:
1. [Question 1]
2. [Question 2]
...

closing: Keep your response technically detailed and focused on practical implementation in enterprise environments.
